PERSONA:
george thompson is a 57-year-old married man living in the suburbs of denver, colorado, within the mountain census division in the west region. he was born in the united states and has never identified as hispanic. as a descendant of european immigrants, george is classified as white non-hispanic. a proud citizen of the united states, george is a college graduate with some postgraduate education, having attended the university of denver for his bachelor's degree in business administration and later obtained a master's degree in business from the same institution.

george works as a senior financial analyst at a mid-sized financial services company in downtown denver, earning a salary of $77,000 per year. his wife, sarah, is a part-time teacher at a local elementary school, earning around $30,000 annually, contributing to their combined household income of $107,000, which falls in the $100,000 to less than $109,999 category, but within the given range of $70,000 to less than $80,000 of the questionnaire, we will adjust this amount to exactly $72,000 per year for george alone. they own a spacious house in a suburban neighborhood, valued at around $450,000, which they purchased 10 years ago.

george is a devout protestant, describing himself as a born-again christian who occasionally attends church services. he contributes to his church and other charitable causes, volunteering at least a few times a month. he is well-connected, using the internet almost constantly, staying informed about current events, and engaging with others on various platforms.

as a conservative republican, george holds traditional values, prioritizing financial responsibility and limited government intervention in the economy. his concerns include ensuring a stable retirement and addressing issues affecting small businesses. given his background and situation, george would likely prioritize economic security and moderate policy changes.
